page.title: 18EVENTS The Derwen Fete
page.content:
The Derwen College is a private college which trains disabled students to be independant.The students are taught crafts e.g. pottery woodwork leatherwork metalwork etc.Sports facilies include a swimming pool, games room and large halls for netball, basketball, football, tennis and badminton.
The annual fete takes place in the summer term on open day and the last day before half-term. Parents, friends and members of the public are all invited. The fete raises money by organising games and fun activities e.g.Soak the Tutor, Coconut Shies, Pony Rides, raffles. There are lots of stalls selling food, drinks, etc..
